channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Why is Donald Trump threatening military action in Nigeria?
How 22-year-old Indian-Americans became world’s youngest self-made billionaires
Now Russia launches nuclear submarine Khabarovsk: What is Putin trying to signal?
Another earthquake rocks Afghanistan. What makes the country so vulnerable to temblors?
Will Trump’s nuclear testing for US include explosions?
‘Kill me, kill me’. Who’s the 32-year-old suspect in the UK train stabbings?
Cold War reversed: How Russia’s superweapons are challenging Nato
item.description: It is the psychological warfare that Russian nuclear signalling has always sought to achieve—not just military victory

item.title: How Apec’s evolving agenda supports India’s Indo-Pacific outlook
item.description: While India is neither a member of Apec nor was the recent summit India-centric, its outcomes offer tangible opportunities for India—if it acts proactively

item.title: Beneath India-China reset, structural faultlines still persist
item.description: India must position itself more carefully and strategically in a neighbourhood that is becoming increasingly volatile with political shifts—something the Chinese are adept at exploiting

item.title: India-US defence deal: Washington must realise benefits of Delhi's strategic autonomy
item.description: May America realise the favourable outcomes of India’s strategic autonomy and want to ensure it stays in India’s procurement and technology demand game

item.title: Next Ayatollah? Why Yunus is targeting Bangladesh Army
item.description: History offers abundant warnings about leaders who claim revolutionary legitimacy as justification for extra-constitutional authority, but what followed was not democracy but theocratic authoritarianism

item.title: Happy Halloween: India’s ‘haunted’ heritage that keeps legends alive all year
item.description: Perhaps it's the most appropriate time of the year to have a bit of fun and speak about a few heritage sites in India which have the sad reputation of being haunted by spirits
